document_notes.text:
This update for python-Pillow fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-50447: Fixed arbitrary code execution via the environment parameter. (bsc#1219048)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Pillow through 10.1.0 allows PIL.ImageMath.eval Arbitrary Code Execution via the environment parameter, a different vulnerability than CVE-2022-22817 (which was about the expression parameter).
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
